Name: Bolster
Description: Place 1 Acolyte from your hand on each space where you already have an Acolyte.

Name: Convene
Description: Pull all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus onto your Colossus's space.

Name: Convene
Description: Pull all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus onto your Colossus's space.

Name: Convert
Description: Replace each opponent's Acolytes on your Colossus's space with Acolytes from your hand. Once you are out of Acolytes from your hand, stop.

Name: Convert
Description: Replace each opponent's Acolytes on your Colossus's space with Acolytes from your hand. Once you are out of Acolytes from your hand, stop.

Name: Influence
Description: Beginning with you and continuing clockwise, each player may move an opponent's Colossus once. Colossi can move within their own roads as usual.

Name: Intimidate
Description: Push all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus 1 space away. Acolytes pushed off the island are killed.

Name: Intimidate
Description: Push all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus 1 space away. Acolytes pushed off the island are killed.

Name: Pilfer
Description: Draw 2 Colossus cards.

Name: Pilfer
Description: Draw 2 Colossus cards.

Name: Purge
Description: Move each Acolyte on your Colossus's space to any adjacent space (you can move Acolytes to different spaces).

Name: Purge
Description: Move each Acolyte on your Colossus's space to any adjacent space (you can move Acolytes to different spaces).

Name: Recall
Description: Move any number of your Acolytes on the board to your Colossus's space. Then, add 2 Acolytes from your hand to your Colossus's space.

Name: Replace
Description: Swap any 2 Colossi on the island.

Name: Ritual Sacrifice
Description: For any Acolyte (including your own) on or adjacent to your Colossus's space, roll the die, and kill the Acolyte if you roll 1 or 2 (Clarify which Acolyte you are rolling for before each roll)

Name: Early Harvest
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Return them to your hand, and Harvest the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Early Harvest
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Return them to your hand, and Harvest the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Early Harvest
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Return them to your hand, and Harvest the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Early Harvest
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Return them to your hand, and Harvest the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Remove all of your Acolytes from the board and return them to your hand. Gain 1 Gold for each Acolyte you removed.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Remove all of your Acolytes from the board and return them to your hand. Gain 1 Gold for each Acolyte you removed.

Name: Steal
Description: Take an opponent's Trait and leave it face-up in front of you. It is now in play for you. If you already had 2 Traits in play, discard 1 of them.

Name: Steal
Description: Take an opponent's Trait and leave it face-up in front of you. It is now in play for you. If you already had 2 Traits in play, discard 1 of them.

Name: Take Pity
Description: Choose another player. They gain 5 Gold. You gain 2 Gold.

Name: Teleport
Description: Move one Colossus to any space.

Name: Vandalize
Description: Discard an opponent's Trait.
